# Publishers.CombineLatest4.Failure

**Type Alias**

The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Failure = A.Failure
```

## Discussion

This publisher produces the failure type shared by its upstream publishers.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Publishers.CombineLatest4.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.
